title: wtb N154 Duke Presidential BBall club

posts.post_title: wtb N154 Duke Presidential BBall club
posts.post_content:
Does anyone have any N154s for sale?  

[url]sethgbernard@gmail.com[/url]
bump after forever. I'd still pay for poses I don't have, which is a little more than half the set. I also have two Harrison batting/Cleveland big pose (5c) if anyone wants to trade!

I have a single example in my type collection as it's a neat series. First thing would be to determine whether you need mine or not. I would likely sell or trade it but would be looking for a fairly stiff exchange. If you care to begin a dialog just post your response here and I'll see it before too long. I have cards I've been looking for in excess of 20 years :-)

[quote name="1880nonsports" post=1752516]I have a single example in my type collection as it's a neat series. First thing would be to determine whether you need mine or not. I would likely sell or trade it but would be looking for a fairly stiff exchange. If you care to begin a dialog just post your response here and I'll see it before too long. I have cards I've been looking for in excess of 20 years :-)[/QUOTE]

Sure, let me know which one you've got!

Cleveland standing and Harrison sliding. I don't have either Keetz or schieber handy and the card on my shelf bit difficult to access this second or I'd shoot a pic..

at least that's who I think it is :-)
